MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK7 postcode area of Stirling. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9am to replace a broken overhead pole in the local area and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.16am on Wednesday 23rd December 2020.
